page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = SkipToWhitespace as l()

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: True if a white space character was found.

page.description: Skip until a whitespace character is encountered. Return true if successful.
page.discussion: The <StringScanner>.SkipToWhitespace() function moves the offset to the next white space character. The offset does not move if it is already pointing to a white space character. The function treats the following characters as white space.

section.title: Example
section.example: dim scanner as P dim txt as C txt = <<%text% This is wonderful prose written by a technical writer of note. %text% scanner = stringscanner.create(txt) ? scanner.SkipToWhitespace() = .T. ? scanner.GetToOffset() = "This" ? scanner.getremainder() =is wonderful prose written by a technical writer of note.
